overview:
Rohit Balaji is the co-founder of Bilneur.com, a 3 dimensional Sell-Rent-Share platform.

Prior to launching bilneur, Rohit was the former CEO & founder of YNB fashion an eCommerce website specialized in fashion accessories. Rohit successfully operated the business for 4 years with revenues grossing over $2m annually.

Bilneur was created from the experience gained at rtfashion and to solve a problem that nobody knows it exists.

Rohit actively participates in various charitable events. He lives in Sunnyvale, California.
